property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Battleships repair at end of round
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Unplaced units live when not placed
Naval Bombard Casualties Return Fire Restricted
notes
property.value:
The Cold War becomes hot in 1956. The Soviet Bloc contends for supremacy against the west.
The rules of AA50 are followed for the most part. The exceptions are
Subs defend at 2 (subs had improved since WW2)
Transports cost 8 and have a defense of 1
Bombers move 10 (intercontinental bombers)
AA Guns and Factories are destroyed in combat
No PU's are gained from taking capitals
Soviet Bloc wins by achieving 150 PU of income
West Bloc wins achieving 250 PU of income
Note that some territories start with units from different sides in them
Income values are based upon the Maddison database (see http://axisandallies.wikia.com/wiki/Maddison_Database)
Unit setup uses data from Correlates of War
Naval units move 4

property.name: Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
